titles.title: A bill to amend the Everglades National Park Protection and Expansion Act of 1989, and for other purposes.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S15216)
Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

committee.name: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources

action.text: Referred to Subcommittee on Public Lands, National Parks.

committee.name: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources

action.text: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources requested executive comment from Army Corps of Engineers, Department of the Interior, and Office of Management and Budget.

committee.name: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources

action.text: Subcommittee on Public Lands, National Parks. Hearings held. Hearings printed: S.Hrg. 103-539.
Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S1531)

committee.name: Senate Energy and Natural Resources
committee.subcommittee: Public Lands, National Parks and Forests

term.name: Federal aid to water resources development

bill.summary: 11/5/1993--Introduced. Amends the Everglades National Park Protection and Expansion Act of 1989 to authorize the Secretary of the Interior to use funds appropriated pursuant to such Act, including funds appropriated for project modifications by the Army Corps of Engineers, to provide Federal assistance to the State of Florida for acquisition of lands adjacent to, or affecting the restoration of natural water flows to, the Everglades National Park or Florida Bay which are located east of the Park and known as the Frog Pond, Rocky Glades Agricultural Area, and the Eight-and-One-Half Square-Mile Area.
